20110126164101.000|20110126164101.000|CC1|THEM.

20110126164459.000|20110126165008.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110126164459.000|20110126164501.000|CC1|>>> WE ARE BACK AT 8:44.        
20110126164501.000|20110126164503.000|CC1|THIS MORNING ON "FOREVER YOUNG" 
20110126164503.000|20110126164504.000|CC1|A SENSITIVE AND IMPORTANT TOPIC 
20110126164504.000|20110126164506.000|CC1|FOR MILLIONS OF AMERICANS -- HOW
20110126164506.000|20110126164508.000|CC1|TO COPE WHEN SOMEONE YOU LOVE   
20110126164508.000|20110126164510.000|CC1|STARTS LOSING HIS OR HER MEMORY.
20110126164510.000|20110126164512.000|CC1|PSYCHOLOGIST DALE ATKINS IS HERE
20110126164512.000|20110126164513.000|CC1|WITH ADVICE.                    
20110126164513.000|20110126164514.000|CC1|GOOD MORNING TO YOU.            
20110126164514.000|20110126164514.000|CC1|>> GOOD MORNING.                
20110126164514.000|20110126164516.000|CC1|>> THIS IS AN IMPORTANT TOPIC   
20110126164516.000|20110126164518.000|CC1|AND IT'S HUGE BECAUSE WE ARE    
20110126164518.000|20110126164521.000|CC1|TALKING ABOUT AGE-RELATED MEMORY
20110126164521.000|20110126164522.000|CC1|OR ALZHEIMER'S OR DEMENTIA.     
20110126164522.000|20110126164523.000|CC1|>> RIGHT.                       
20110126164523.000|20110126164525.000|CC1|>> WE'LL BREAK IT DOWN INTO TWO 
20110126164525.000|20110126164525.000|CC1|DAYS.                           
20110126164525.000|20110126164527.000|CC1|TODAY WE ARE DOING AGE-RELATED  
20110126164527.000|20110126164528.000|CC1|MEMORY LOSS.                    
20110126164528.000|20110126164530.000|CC1|JUST SO PEOPLE UNDERSTAND HOW IS
20110126164530.000|20110126164532.000|CC1|IT DIFFERENT FROM DEMENTIA.     
20110126164532.000|20110126164535.000|CC1|>> GENERALLY IT GETS TO A POINT 
20110126164535.000|20110126164537.000|CC1|AND DOESN'T CONTINUE TO GO WAY, 
20110126164537.000|20110126164538.000|CC1|WAY DOWN LIKE DEMENTIA DOES.    
20110126164538.000|20110126164540.000|CC1|WHEN YOU PUT YOUR KEYS DOWN AND 
20110126164540.000|20110126164541.000|CC1|CAN'T REMEMBER WHERE THEY ARE OR
20110126164541.000|20110126164543.000|CC1|YOU MEET SOMEONE AND YOU TWO    
20110126164543.000|20110126164545.000|CC1|SECONDS LATER CAN'T REMEMBER    
20110126164545.000|20110126164547.000|CC1|THEIR NAME OR YOU HAVE A SENSE  
20110126164547.000|20110126164548.000|CC1|THAT, GEE, I SHOULD REMEMBER    
20110126164548.000|20110126164549.000|CC1|THIS BUT I'M NOT REMEMBERING IT.
20110126164549.000|20110126164552.000|CC1|A LOT OF IT IS MORE IN THE      
20110126164552.000|20110126164553.000|CC1|RECENT PAST.                    
20110126164553.000|20110126164556.000|CC1|>> MORE SHORT-TERM MEMORY LOSS? 
20110126164556.000|20110126164558.000|CC1|>> IT'S RECENT MEMORY.          
20110126164558.000|20110126164559.000|CC1|WE HAVE ISSUES LIKE IF I JUST   
20110126164559.000|20110126164601.000|CC1|FOCUS ON IT I WILL PROBABLY     
20110126164601.000|20110126164602.000|CC1|REMEMBER IT AND IT WILL COME    
20110126164602.000|20110126164603.000|CC1|BACK.                           
20110126164603.000|20110126164604.000|CC1|WHERE DID I PUT THE CAR?        
20110126164604.000|20110126164606.000|CC1|OH, NOW I REMEMBER.             
20110126164606.000|20110126164607.000|CC1|SO IT DOES COME BACK AND YOU    
20110126164607.000|20110126164608.000|CC1|GIVE YOURSELF TIME.             
20110126164608.000|20110126164610.000|CC1|THAT'S THE MEMORY LOSS WE ARE   
20110126164610.000|20110126164611.000|CC1|TALKING ABOUT.                  
20110126164611.000|20110126164613.000|CC1|IT CAUSES DISTRESS AND YOU'RE   
20110126164613.000|20110126164615.000|CC1|RUNNING UP AND DOWN THE STAIRS  
20110126164615.000|20110126164618.000|CC1|THREE TIMES LIKE, I KNOW I CAME 
20110126164618.000|20110126164618.000|CC1|UP FOR SOMETHING.

20110126164619.000|20110126164622.000|CC1|I DO THESE THINGS EVERY DAY.    
20110126164622.000|20110126164623.000|CC1|DO PEOPLE REALIZE IT WHEN IT'S  
20110126164623.000|20110126164626.000|CC1|HAPPENING OR ARE WE IN DENIAL   
20110126164626.000|20110126164627.000|CC1|ABOUT THIS?

20110126164628.000|20110126164629.000|CC1|WE UNDERSTAND THAT WE WALK INTO 
20110126164629.000|20110126164631.000|CC1|THE KITCHEN AND SAY, WHAT DID I 
20110126164631.000|20110126164633.000|CC1|COME IN HERE FOR?

20110126164655.000|20110126164700.000|CC1|>> KEEP THEM SOCIALLY ACTIVE AND
20110126164700.000|20110126164700.000|CC1|INVOLVED.

20110126164712.000|20110126164714.000|CC1|WE ARE VALUED WHEN WE ARE WITH

20110126164958.000|20110126164959.000|CC1|YOU KEEP IT IN YOUR MIND.       
20110126164959.000|20110126165001.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU SO MUCH, DALE
